text:
Seeing lot of discussion right now about #chloroquine:

▶️ where to traditionally* prescribe it
▶️ dosage guidelines
▶️ potential side effects 
▶️ contraindications 

But in the #COVID19 context - where ~20% can be severe - it remains relevant based on all *cited research 👇  IMO https://t.co/Fr7bqsKNji
